EmailTemplate.description: Template for rebate contract rejection notification sent out.
EmailTemplate.name: Rebate Contract Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Rebate Contract rejected - {!jj_rb_Rebate_Contract__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Contract Id: {!jj_rb_Rebate_Contract__c.Name} for {!jj_rb_Rebate_Contract__c.jj_rb_Customer__c} is awaiting your approval.
Regards, Rebate Management Team
